recipe.title: Minty Roasted Potato
ingredients: 1/2 cup coarsely chopped fresh mint leaves (from about 1 large bunch)
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
instructions: 2. Scrub the potatoes and prick each 3 or 4 times with a fork. Place in a single layer on a shallow roasting pan and bake for 2 hours. Cut each potato in half.
3. Toss potatoes with remaining ingredients in a large bowl. Let rest for 30 minutes before serving.
